response.original_title: Yahan Wahan Saare Jahan (Here and Everywhere)
response.overview: As the Covid-19 pandemic tightens its grip around the world, the divine Sage Narada travels to remote villages and towns of Central India, only to find multiple, parallelly running narratives of coronavirus among the village and town folk. A confused Narada then makes his way to the gods to report about these human activities.
response.title: Yahan Wahan Saare Jahan (Here and Everywhere)
